metadata.title: CVE-2016-8680 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The _dwarf_get_abbrev_for_code function in dwarf_util.c in libdwarf20161001 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(out-of-bounds read) by calling the dwarfdump command on a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8680` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dwarfdump - 20161001-2
libdwarf1 - 20161001-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dwarfutils package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20161001-2').
